snippet: Malik Taylor, 32, admitted in state Supreme Court in Manhattan that he had several sexual encounters over two months with a 16-year-old student at the school where he worked.
abstract: Malik Taylor, former administrator at a Manhattan high school who admitted to having affairs with students, pleads guilty to one count of third-degree rape in a deal with prosecutors; Taylor resigned after his affairs came to light and will serve 90 days in jail, be on parole for ten years, and be listed on New York State's sex offender registry.
lead_paragraph: Malik Taylor, 32, admitted in state Supreme Court in Manhattan that he had several sexual encounters over two months with a 16-year-old student at the school where he worked.

headline.main: Man to Serve Three Months in Jail for His Affair With Student
headline.print_headline: Man to Serve Three Months for His Affair With Student
